content.question: If <math alttext="2 x times y squared, minus 3 times x squared, times y, equals, 6 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 6, and denominator 4 y, minus 6 x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 times y squared, minus, 2 times x y, minus 6, and denominator 3 times x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 2 times y squared, plus 6 times x y, plus 6, and denominator 4 times x y, minus 3 times x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 2 times y squared, plus 6 times x y, plus 3 times x squared, plus 6, and denominator 4 times x y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 2 times y squared, plus 6 times x y, plus 6, and denominator 4 times x y, minus 3 times x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
